Image Restore.template: restore the photo, remove scratches, restore missing parts, colorize, sharpen

Change Color.description: Change the color of a specific object or region.

Replace Background.description: Replace the background while keeping the main subject.
Replace Background.template: Replace the background with {background}, keep the {subject} unchanged.

Add Object.description: Add an object into the scene.
Add Object.template: Add a {object} {location}. Keep lighting and perspective consistent.

Remove Object.template: Remove the {object} and fill in the background naturally.

Style Transfer.description: Transform the overall style while preserving identity/composition.
Style Transfer.template: Transform the image into {style} style, keep the main subject and composition unchanged.

Edit Text In Image.description: Replace text on a sign, label, or UI.
Edit Text In Image.template: Replace the text on the {surface} with "{text}".

Change Expression.template: Make the {subject} have a {expression} expression while keeping identity.

Change Clothing.description: Alter clothing item while keeping person identity.
Change Clothing.template: Change the {subject}'s {clothing_item} to {style_or_color}. Keep the person's face and identity unchanged.

tips: Use direct action verbs: Change, Replace, Add, Remove, Make, Turn, Transform.
Be specific about the subject (e.g., 'the woman in the red dress') and what to keep unchanged.
Avoid pronouns like 'it' or 'her'; refer to objects explicitly.
For text, specify the surface and the exact replacement text in quotes.

Image Restore.template: restore the photo, remove scratches, restore missing parts, colorize, sharpen

Change Color.description: Change object color with explicit subject.
Change Color.template: Change the {subject}'s color to {color}. Keep everything else unchanged.

Replace Background.description: Replace background while preserving the subject.
Replace Background.template: Replace the background with {background}. Keep the {subject} unchanged and in the same position.

Add Object.template: Add a {object} {location}. Match lighting and perspective; keep the {subject} unchanged.

Remove Object.template: Remove the {object} and reconstruct the background naturally. Keep other elements unchanged.

Style Transfer.template: Transform the image into {style} style. Keep the {subject} unchanged (identity, pose, and features).

Edit Text In Image.template: Replace the text on the {surface} with "{text}". Keep font style consistent if possible.

Change Lighting.template: Make the lighting {lighting}. Keep colors and subject identity unchanged.

Change Expression.template: Make the {subject} have a {expression} expression while keeping identity.

Change Clothing.description: Alter clothing item while keeping person identity.
Change Clothing.template: Change the {clothing_item} to {style_or_color} on the {subject}. Keep the person's face and identity unchanged.

negatives.default: deformed, distorted hands, extra limbs, artifacts
